EmailTemplate.subject: NGA 2021: Join NCR to see where grocery retail is headed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A lot has happened since we last met. NCR and Freshop have merged, and we are looking forward to presenting our combined strength at this years’ NGA. Find out why NCR is uniquely positioned to provide the solutions that run your stores. Join NCR at NGA 2021 in Booth #525. We’ll be showcasing how NCR Freshop is integrated with NCR Systems for an efficient set up and a consistent experience across your instore and online channels. Find out how you can take advantage of the current trends in online grocery. Another highlight will be our latest advancements in Self-Checkout so you can let your customers shop the way they want.
